2. Planar conformation

The entity "planar conformation" could also be considered relevant, as it describes a property of the molecule that affects its solubility and interactions, but it is not as direct a measure of value as the other two entities.

The entity "torsion angle" is not directly related to the value of the material, and so it can be removed from the list of relevant entities.
